Package entities

Interface CharacterI

All Known Implementing Classes:
Character, Enemy, Player
public interface CharacterI
This interface represents behavior and properties for a character in a game. The character has a name, current health, and fire power, and can perform various actions related to its state and attributes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getCurrentHealth()
    Retrieves the current health of the entity.
    int getFirePower()
    Retrieves the fire power of the character or entity.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Retrieves the name of the character.
    boolean isAlive()
    Determines whether the character is alive based on their current health.
    void setCurrentHealth​(int currentHealth)
    Sets the current health of the character.
    void setFirePower​(int firePower)
    Sets the fire power of the character.
    void takesDamageFrom​(int damage)
    Reduces the current health of the character based on the damage received.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the character.
      Returns:
      the name of the character

    • getCurrentHealth

      int getCurrentHealth()
      Retrieves the current health of the entity.
      Returns:
      the current health value as an integer

    • getFirePower

      int getFirePower()
      Retrieves the fire power of the character or entity.
      Returns:
      the fire power value as an integer

    • setCurrentHealth

      void setCurrentHealth​(int currentHealth)
      Sets the current health of the character.
      Parameters:
      currentHealth - the new current health value to set

    • setFirePower

      void setFirePower​(int firePower)
      Sets the fire power of the character.
      Parameters:
      firePower - the new fire power value

    • takesDamageFrom

      void takesDamageFrom​(int damage)
      Reduces the current health of the character based on the damage received. If the resulting health drops below 0, it will be set to 0.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to inflict on the character

    • isAlive

      boolean isAlive()
      Determines whether the character is alive based on their current health.
      Returns:
      true if the character's current health is greater than 0, else false
